column1: The Pit Room////The Pit Room is a top notch barbecue joint in downtown Houston. I've just tried the pulled pork
column2: which was amazing (juicy and very flavorful). Their side options are fantastic too - the baked beans were savory and delicious without being overly sweet
column3: and the elote in a cup was fun and well balanced. I also loved their pickle bar
column4: where you could get all sorts of pickled cucumbers
